section.heading: Applicability.
section.text: This chapter does not apply to misappropriation occurring prior to March 16, 1989. With respect to a continuing misappropriation that began prior to March 16, 1989, the chapter does not apply to the continuing misappropriation that occurs after March 16, 1989.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 11 of the Uniform Trade Secrets Act.
